basics.name: Jordan (Jordie) Michael Skarajew
basics.label: Undergraduate Mathematics Student
basics.summary: Pure Mathematics student at the University of Melbourne, with interests in stochastic processes, financial modelling, and mathematical optimisation.

work.name: ONCALL Group Australia
work.summary: NDIS Plan Manager for 120+ VIC/QLD participants.
highlights: Implemented AP automation strategies through Microsoft Power Automate using OCR.
Aided in the unification of financial data & processes between VIC, QLD & SA teams.

work.name: ONCALL Group Australia
highlights: Responded to and actioned 300+ phone calls daily, liaising between all teams across states.
Maintained, recorded and updated data for head office.

work.name: Coles Group
work.summary: Hardware/Software Technician across the Coles Group
highlights: Consistently ranked first in team for client satisfaction whilst solving queries in half the time of specified KPIs.

work.name: Australian Fresh Leaf Herb
highlights: Analysed and optimised staff workflow in preparation of Coles herb sleeves, saving >50% in preparation time.
Assisted in preparation of leaf and herb supply for most Coles Group supermarkets across VIC, NSW, QLD & TAS.
